unique_effects.description:
Attack a Behemoth part to lock onto it and load a homing missile. Missile deals {{damageMissile}} damage and increases the
damage of every other missile in the volley by {{damageMissileVolley}}. Deal damage to load up to a maximum of {{maxMissiles}} additional missiles.
Dodging fires all loaded missiles on the locked-on part. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
